title: U.S.: Citi Announces Title Sponsorship of Citi Summer Streets
summary: New York - Citi, in conjunction with the New York City Department of Transportation, is proud to announce its role as the title sponsor of this year's Citi Summer Streets, an annual celebration that turns Park Avenue into a pedestrian playground for three consecutive Saturdays in August - August 6, 13 and 20 from 7 a.m. to 1 p.m. (ET). As part of Citi's "Make it Here" campaign, Citi is launching a full program of outdoor activities celebrating the passions New Yorkers share - sports, food, music and fashion.
tag-1: U.S.: Citi Announces Title Sponsorship of Citi Summer Streets
tag-3: New York – Citi, in conjunction with the New York City Department of Transportation, is proud to announce its role as the title sponsor of this year's Citi Summer Streets, an annual celebration that turns Park Avenue into a pedestrian playground for three consecutive Saturdays in August – August 6, 13 and 20 from 7 a.m. to 1 p.m. (ET). As part of Citi's "Make it Here" campaign, Citi is launching a full program of outdoor activities celebrating the passions New Yorkers share – sports, food, music and fashion.
tag-4: "New Yorkers love their city, and they work hard to make it here," said Will Howle, Head of U.S. Retail Banking at Citi. "We see this every day in our Citibank branches, whether we're empowering a small business owner to expand their company, helping a family purchase their first apartment, or just starting a college grad on the road to financial independence. We're proud to call this city our home, and to offer our neighbors the opportunity to enjoy the unique experience of Citi Summer Streets."
tag-5: "As we return seven miles of Manhattan streets to pedestrians and cyclists the next three weekends, New Yorkers lucky enough to be in town have a lot to look forward to at Citi Summer Streets," said Commissioner Polly Trottenberg. "I am myself excited to hop on a Citi Bike to discover the car-free street -- and also look forward to sliding down Vita Coco's Beachside Slide, grabbing a tasty snack at the Taste of Summer Sampling Zone, whizzing down the popular Zip Line or testing the agility of my dog at the Paws and Play Dog Park."
tag-6: Citi's sponsorship will kick off with an appearance by Paralympian Scout Basset, a member of Team Citi, at Astor Place from 8:30 a.m. – 9:15 a.m. (ET) on Saturday, August 6. Citi will host a range of events, including live musical performances, food tastings from New York City's most buzzed about new chefs, a fashion show and the chance to test your athletic prowess by "racing" an Olympian.
tag-7: Citi Summer Streets occurs along Park Avenue and Lafayette Street from the Brooklyn Bridge to Central Park.
tag-8: To learn more about Citi Summer Streets, including the route and activities, please visit www.citi.com/nyc, and follow on Twitter at #CitiSummerStreets and #makeithere
tag-9: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
